snippet: Southampton won, 3-1, at Stamford Bridge in London, leaving Chelsea, the defending Premier League champion, 10 points behind the leader Manchester City.
lead_paragraph: Southampton won, 3-1, at Stamford Bridge in London, leaving Chelsea, the defending Premier League champion, 10 points behind the leader Manchester City.

headline.main: Southampton Sends Chelsea to Another Loss
headline.print_headline: Southampton Sends Chelsea to Another Loss
